name: fuckyoufriday
text: I love when Beef gets those big spacey vertical eye slits.

name: bismark
text: I love Beef so much just for the fact that filing early is dope to him.

name: clintisiceman
text: Hello? Is it meeeee you're lookin' fooooor?

name: deimosrising
text: Classic, total classic. My uncle was once audited; they did in fact know that he lied.

name: juancarlos
text:
Dide he run smack in his van?

I like that Todd is a convicted felon and drug dealer, but somehow feels compelled to file his taxes.

name: iloveyoucupcake
text: Don't forget he also is a squirrel

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CatJumpJohn, worldbelow, farqussus)

name: cracklewater
text:
Squirrels in the Underground have to pay taxes like everyone else, it seems.

There's also evidence of a squirrel police force from the 'awesome' ticket that was left on Todd's van. Their funding must come from somewhere.

name: greenkoolayd
text: police dont give you tickets for awesomeness.

name: lexsenthur
text: Th-th-that's what they get ya for! Capone, Costello, all b-b-busted for tax evasion! YOU GOTTA HELP ME BEEF!

name: a_dude
text: classic beef.

name: antsama
text: Todd is visually shaken by Beef's warning.  This is one of my favorite strips thanks to the last two panels.

name: jezebel
text: He should be.  I'm an auditor, and I do have special lie-detecting vision.  You get it on your first day in a special ceremony.  You feel all warm and fuzzy until you get your W-2 and see that now you have to pay more in taxes due to this special "non-monetary  compensation".

name: anomalous3
text: Dude, when beef gets those slitty eyeballs he speaks truth. There's a reason his first name's cassandra, dig?

name: geysershitdick
text: hella classical references up ins

name: howl
text: He is usually believed, though, isn't he?

name: thisdoggisproice
text: heck yeah we can get around the fact that you are a dealer

name: centipede_damascus
text: I probably should have been audited about three times by now, but it hasn't happened yet.

name: huber
text: A comment left by huber was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by xiaomimi, patiently56, dj)

name: feetnotes
text: Man I miss Todd being drawn like this. I guess it's harder to show expression though.

name: epicurus
text: Last panel = 5/5.

name: closefriend
text: Todd's visiting Beef because he doesn't want to risk another lethal injection.

name: paco
text: A comment left by paco was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ezcmac, scrumpton, Jopon, D-pad, Carrot, rodneystubbs, Darthemed)

name: mercuri0us
text: you ok man?

name: flim
text:
First Achewood I ever read--never could stop
Something about Todd's sincere mortal terror in the last panel

name: shmuckeles
text: and something about the way Todd says, "Real respectable like," has forever given him a Joe Pesci kinda voice in my mind that automatically includes some variation on "fuck" every thoid fuckn woid

name: nice-on-water
text:
Or Adam Sandler in Billy Madison

ONE YEAR LATER OHHHH YEAAAH

name: joeyramoney
text: in Achewood: The Movie, Todd will be played by John Leguizamo.

name: mastronaut
text: oh fucking yes!

name: deusoma
text: I bet you could make a decent movie with John Leguizamo playing every single role. Like the Nutty Professor, but good.

name: heccibiggs
text: Shit you're so right

name: nicolae
text: This gets a 5 for the first panel alone.

name: featurelessvoid
text: I'm trying to figure out how to give it a 6 for the second panel

name: mikebox
text: Beef thinks filin' early is dope. I never met someone who filed early and lived in a pool shack.

name: serf
text:
todd is such a fukken badass.

and i love how beef gets the shakes in the last panel.

name: farqussus
text: Beef is leaning forward. To emphasise his point. Please stop making Ween fans look stupid.

name: nucleargeranium
text:
They just...

KNOW.

name: coco
text: Can't you . . . SEE?

name: poppechan
text: Oh, wow. Beef looks INTENSE in the last panel.
